verses.verse: These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, Levi <S%H3878><s%>, and Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, and Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>,
Dan <S%H1835><s%>, Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and Asher <S%H836><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: Er <S%H6147><s%>, and Onan <S%H209><s%>, and Shelah <S%H7956><s%>; which three <S%H7969><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> unto him of Shua <S%H7774><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%> the Canaanitess <S%H3669><s%>. And Er <S%H6147><s%>, Judah <S%H3063><s%>'s first-born <S%H1060><s%>, was wicked <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and he slew him <S%H4191><s%>.

And Tamar <S%H8559><s%> his daughter-in <S%H3618><s%>-law bare <S%H3205><s%> him Perez <S%H6557><s%> and Zerah <S%H2226><s%>. All the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> were five <S%H2568><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%>: Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, and Hamul <S%H2538><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%>: Zimri <S%H2174><s%>, and Ethan <S%H387><s%>, and Heman <S%H1968><s%>, and Calcol <S%H3633><s%>, and Dara <S%H1873><s%>; five of them in all <S%H2568><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Carmi <S%H3756><s%>: Achar <S%H5917><s%>, the troubler <S%H5916><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, who committed a trespass <S%H4603><s%> in the devoted thing <S%H2764><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ethan <S%H387><s%>: Azariah <S%H5838><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> also of Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, that were born <S%H3205><s%> unto him <S%H3396><s%>: Jerahmeel, and Ram <S%H7410><s%>, and Chelubai <S%H3621><s%>.

And Ram <S%H7410><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>, and Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Nahshon <S%H5177><s%>, prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>;
and Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Salma <S%H8007><s%>, and Salma <S%H8007><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Boaz <S%H1162><s%>,
and Boaz <S%H1162><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Obed <S%H5744><s%>, and Obed <S%H5744><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jesse <S%H3448><s%>;
and Jesse <S%H3448><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> his first-born <S%H1060><s%> Eliab <S%H446><s%>, and Abinadab <S%H41><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>, and Shimea <S%H8092><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>,
Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%>, Raddai <S%H7288><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%>,
Ozem <S%H684><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%>, David <S%H1732><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%>;

and their sisters <S%H269><s%> were Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> and Abigail <S%H26><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%>: Abishai <S%H52><s%>, and Joab <S%H3097><s%>, and Asahel <S%H6214><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%>.
And Abigail <S%H26><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> Amasa <S%H6021><s%>; and the father <S%H1><s%> of Amasa <S%H6021><s%> was Jether <S%H3500><s%> the Ishmaelite <S%H3459><s%>.

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hezron <S%H2696><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> children of <S%H854><s%> Azubah <S%H5806><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, and of Jerioth <S%H3408><s%>; and these were her sons <S%H1121><s%>: Jesher <S%H3475><s%>, and Shobab <S%H7727><s%>, and Ardon <S%H715><s%>.
And Azubah <S%H5806><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> unto him Ephrath <S%H672><s%>, who bare <S%H3205><s%> him Hur <S%H2354><s%>.
And Hur <S%H2354><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Uri <S%H221><s%>, and Uri <S%H221><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Bezalel <S%H1212><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, whom he took to wife <S%H3947><s%> when he was threescore <S%H8346><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> him Segub <S%H7687><s%>.
And Segub <S%H7687><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jair <S%H2971><s%>, who had three <S%H7969><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.

And Geshur <S%H1650><s%> and Aram <S%H758><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair <S%H2971><s%> from them <S%H7079><s%>, with Kenath, and the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof <S%H8346><s%>, even threescore cities <S%H5892><s%>. All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> that Hezron <S%H2696><s%> was dead <S%H4194><s%> in Caleb-ephrathah <S%H3613><s%>, then Abijah <S%H29><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> him Ashhur <S%H806><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Tekoa <S%H8620><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of Hezron <S%H2696><s%> were Ram <S%H7410><s%> the first-born <S%H1060><s%>, and Bunah <S%H946><s%>, and Oren <S%H767><s%>, and Ozem <S%H684><s%>, Ahijah <S%H281><s%>.
And Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> had another <S%H312><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Atarah <S%H5851><s%>; she was the mother <S%H517><s%> of Onam <S%H208><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ram <S%H7410><s%> the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> were Maaz <S%H4619><s%>, and Jamin <S%H3226><s%>, and Eker <S%H6134><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Onam <S%H208><s%> were Shammai <S%H8060><s%>, and Jada <S%H3047><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shammai <S%H8060><s%>: Nadab <S%H5070><s%>, and Abishur <S%H51><s%>.
And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the wife <S%H802><s%> of Abishur <S%H51><s%> was Abihail <S%H32><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> him Ahban <S%H257><s%>, and Molid <S%H4140><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nadab <S%H5070><s%>: Seled <S%H5540><s%>, and Appaim <S%H649><s%>; but Seled <S%H5540><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> without children <S%H1121><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Appaim <S%H649><s%>: Ishi <S%H3469><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishi <S%H3469><s%>: Sheshan <S%H8348><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sheshan <S%H8348><s%>: Ahlai <S%H304><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jada <S%H3047><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Shammai <S%H8060><s%>: Jether <S%H3500><s%>, and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>; and Jether <S%H3500><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> without children <S%H1121><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>: Peleth <S%H6431><s%>, and Zaza <S%H2117><s%>. These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%>.

Now Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> had no sons <S%H1121><s%>, but daughters <S%H1323><s%>. And Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> had a servant <S%H5650><s%>, an Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Jarha <S%H3398><s%>.
And Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to Jarha <S%H3398><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> him Attai <S%H6262><s%>.
And Attai <S%H6262><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Nathan <S%H5416><s%>, and Nathan <S%H5416><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Zabad <S%H2066><s%>,
and Zabad <S%H2066><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Ephlal <S%H654><s%>, and Ephlal <S%H654><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Obed <S%H5744><s%>,
and Obed <S%H5744><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jehu <S%H3058><s%>, and Jehu <S%H3058><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Azariah <S%H5838><s%>,
and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Helez <S%H2503><s%>, and Helez <S%H2503><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Eleasah <S%H501><s%>,
and Eleasah <S%H501><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Sismai <S%H5581><s%>, and Sismai <S%H5581><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Shallum <S%H7967><s%>,
and Shallum <S%H7967><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jekamiah <S%H3359><s%>, and Jekamiah <S%H3359><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Elishama <S%H476><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> were Mesha <S%H4337><s%> his first-born <S%H1060><s%>, who was the father <S%H1><s%> of Ziph <S%H2128><s%>; and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mareshah <S%H4762><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%>: Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and Tappuah <S%H8599><s%>, and Rekem <S%H7552><s%>, and Shema <S%H8087><s%>.
And Shema <S%H8087><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Raham <S%H7357><s%>, the father <S%H1><s%> of Jorkeam <S%H3421><s%>; and Rekem <S%H7552><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Shammai <S%H8060><s%>.
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shammai <S%H8060><s%> was Maon <S%H4584><s%>; and Maon <S%H4584><s%> was the father <S%H1><s%> of Beth-zur <S%H1049><s%>.

And Ephah <S%H5891><s%>, Caleb <S%H3612><s%>'s concubine <S%H6370><s%>, bare <S%H3205><s%> Haran <S%H2771><s%>, and Moza <S%H4162><s%>, and Gazez <S%H1495><s%>; and Haran <S%H2771><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Gazez <S%H1495><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jahdai <S%H3056><s%>: Regem <S%H7276><s%>, and Jothan <S%H3147><s%>, and Geshan <S%H1529><s%>, and Pelet <S%H6404><s%>, and Ephah <S%H5891><s%>, and Shaaph <S%H8174><s%>.
Maacah <S%H4601><s%>, Caleb <S%H3612><s%>'s concubine <S%H6370><s%>, bare <S%H3205><s%> Sheber <S%H7669><s%> and Tirhanah <S%H8647><s%>.

She bare <S%H3205><s%> also Shaaph <S%H8174><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Madmannah <S%H4089><s%>, Sheva <S%H7724><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Machbena <S%H4343><s%>, and the father <S%H1><s%> of Gibea <S%H1388><s%>; and the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> was Achsah <S%H5915><s%>.

These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur <S%H2354><s%>, the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of Ephrathah <S%H672><s%>: Shobal <S%H7732><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Kiriath-jearim <S%H7157><s%>,
Salma <S%H8007><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Beth-lehem <S%H1035><s%>, Hareph <S%H2780><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Beth-gader <S%H1013><s%>.
And Shobal <S%H7732><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Kiriath-jearim <S%H7157><s%> had sons <S%H1121><s%>: Haroeh <S%H7204><s%>, half <S%H2677><s%> of the Menuhoth <S%H2679><s%>.

And the families <S%H4940><s%> of Kiriath-jearim <S%H7157><s%>: The Ithrites <S%H3505><s%>, and the Puthites <S%H6336><s%>, and the Shumathites <S%H8126><s%>, and the Mishraites <S%H4954><s%>; of them came <S%H3318><s%> the Zorathites <S%H6882><s%> and the Eshtaolites <S%H848><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Salma <S%H8007><s%>: Beth-lehem <S%H1035><s%>, and the Netophathites <S%H5200><s%>, Atroth-beth <S%H5852><s%>-joab, <S%H5854><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of the Manahathites <S%H2680><s%>, the Zorites <S%H6882><s%>.

And the families <S%H4940><s%> of scribes <S%H5608><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Jabez <S%H3258><s%>: the Tirathites <S%H8654><s%>, the Shimeathites <S%H8101><s%>, the Sucathites <S%H7756><s%>. These <S%H1992><s%> are the Kenites <S%H7017><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> of Hammath <S%H2574><s%>, the father <S%H1><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Rechab <S%H7394><s%>.
